adDetails: I offer a repair service on blown speakers that are hard to find and expensive. Specializing on automotive speakers and home speakers. Some speakers are impossible to find replacement so repair makes the most sense. I can repair broken or fraying foam on the speaker surround. Small size speaker is no problem. Ripped paper and polyurethan cone can also be repaired. Repair is between $50-70 per speaker. I can quote you if you send me a picture of the speaker.
